[I]191-the man wait [my]191-the man turn at the single blinking red light in [Gold Haven]1-gold haven , [Kentucky]2-kentucky , and turn left before pulling into [the gas station]164-the gas station . This is the first place [I]191-the man ever pumped gas in [my]191-the man life . It was a lot cheaper then too . [My]191-the man Pontiac is n’t a whole lot nicer than the 1988 Fiero [I]191-the man drove back then , but in [this town]165-this town , it does n’t stand out , and that ’s exactly what [I]191-the man need . [I]191-the man tug on a trucker hat and slip on sunglasses before opening the door and climbing out .

The old pumps [I]191-the man expected , the ones where the numbers click over as [you]166-you fill up , have been replaced with newer models .

Even better . It lowers the chance that [someone]167-someone will recognize [me]191-the man if [I]191-the man can avoid all human interaction .

[I]191-the man swipe [my]191-the man card , get [my]191-the man gas , and twist the gas cap back on . When [I]191-the man get back to [Nashville]15-nashville , [I]191-the man ’m finally going to look into replacing [this car]168-this car . [I]191-the man rarely splurge on anything .

Even though [I]191-the man won a “ million - dollar recording contract ”[191-the man] on Country Dreams , the amount [I]191-the man saw was laughable . Albums ? [They]169-they ’re expensive as hell to produce . And as far as the pay [I]191-the man get per show when [I]191-the man ’m on tour , after all the expenses are covered ? It ’s also nothing to write [home]170-home about . But as [my]191-the man share of the ticket sales goes up and [I]191-the man build [my]191-the man fan base , that will eventually change .

But for now , [I]191-the man ’m saving every penny [I]191-the man can and getting by on the bare minimum because [I]191-the man do n’t know when the bottom will fall out .

Not much has changed about that since [I]191-the man married [billionaire Creighton Karas]48-creighton . Clunk .

[She]1176-holly moves [her]1176-holly head from side to side , shaking it slowly . “ [I]1176-holly ’ll go anywhere with [you]1176-holly , [Mr. Karas]108-mr. karas . Take [me]1176-holly away . ”[1176-holly]
